lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: Why did the vicar refuse to cut down the tree?
lyrics.translation: 为什么牧师拒绝砍掉那棵树？

lyrics.text: The tiny village of Friendly is said to possess a cursed tree.
lyrics.translation: 据说友好这个小村庄里有一棵被诅咒的树。

lyrics.text: Because the tree was mentioned in a newspaper, the number of visitors to Friendly has now increased.
lyrics.translation: 因为报纸上提到了这棵树，现在去Friendly的游客数量增加了。

lyrics.text: The tree was planted near the church fifty years ago.
lyrics.translation: 这棵树是五十年前种在教堂附近的。

lyrics.text: But it is only in recent years that it has gained an evil reputation.
lyrics.translation: 但只是近几年它才获得了恶名。

lyrics.text: It is said that if anyone touches the tree, he will have bad luck. If he picks a leaf, he will die.
lyrics.translation: 据说如果有人触碰这棵树，他将会有坏运气。如果他摘了一片叶子，他将会死去。

lyrics.text: Many villagers believe that the tree has already claimed a number of victims.
lyrics.translation: 许多村民相信这棵树已经夺走了许多生命。

lyrics.text: The vicar has been asked to have the tree cut down, but so far he has refused.
lyrics.translation: 牧师被要求砍掉这棵树，但到目前为止他拒绝了。

lyrics.text: He has pointed out that the tree is a useful source of income, as tourists have been coming from all parts of the country to see it.
lyrics.translation: 他指出这棵树是收入的有用来源，因为来自全国各地的游客一直在前来参观它。

lyrics.text: In spite of all that has been said, the tourists have been picking leaves and cutting their names on the tree trunk.
lyrics.translation: 尽管已经说过所有的话，游客们还是摘叶子并在树干上刻名字。

lyrics.text: So far, not one of them has been struck down by sudden death.
lyrics.translation: 到目前为止，他们中还没有一个人突然死亡。
